VMware's [[enterprise software]], [[VMware ESX]] Server, runs directly on [[server (computing)|server]] hardware without requiring an additional underlying [[operating system]]<ref name="ESXArch"> {{cite web |url=http://www.vmware.com/support/esx21/doc/esx21_admin_system_architecture.html |title=ESX Server Architecture |publisher=Vmware.com |date= |accessdate=2009-10-22}} </ref>.
VMware's desktop software runs on [[Microsoft Windows]], [[Linux]], and [[Mac OS X]]. VMware's [[enterprise software]], [[VMware ESX]] Server, runs directly on [[server (computing)|server]] hardware without requiring an additional underlying [[operating system]]<ref name="ESXArch"> {{cite web |url=http://www.vmware.com/support/esx21/doc/esx21_admin_system_architecture.html |title=ESX Server Architecture |publisher=Vmware.com |date= |accessdate=2009-10-22}} </ref>.
